actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to designate the Mulholland National Scenic Parkway in the State of California, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to designate as Mulholland National Scenic Parkway specified sections of the present Mulholland Drive and Highway for public recreation use and for interpretation of scenic and historic values. Authorizes to be appropriated such sums as may be necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to designate the Mulholland National Scenic Parkway in the State of California, and for other purposes.
